      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        Runs if the database table hasn't been created yet. Creates the database table and adds in the default values.
        Specified by:

      • onUpgrade

        public void onUpgrade(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                      int oldVersion,
                      int newVersion)
        Runs if the database table is going to be upgraded to a newer version. It drops the old table and then calls the #onCreate method to create a new database table.
        Specified by:
        onUpgrade in class android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
